column1: Smoque BBQ////And now for the review: Seriously
column2: let me start first by saying that damn
column3: this place is super efficient. As soon as we walked in we were greeted and informed that upon ordering we'd then be seated. So it's 6:30 on a Friday night and there's a manageable line in front of us
column5: no big deal. I ordered the Pulled Pork Platter and my boyfriend got the brisket platter.
